parameters: \!Don't you see I'm trying to catch a fish!?
\}Be careful Wes we don't know if he's even human...
Oh... Indeed, he is... \}or so it seems.
Check current objectives in the Quest tab.
\!I couldn't catch any fish and I'm hungry~
Heh... I'm about to catch my third.
Then that's enough! Let's go to the Castle, the king
...It's been 2 hours past our appointment time.
Fuck you, and fuck your King.
\!Guess I'll keep all the reward to myself!
Check current objectives in the Quest tab.

events.name: EV008
events.note: This will be deleted. It's for practice.

parameters: Can't I just go for a damn walk without this
I'd better get the hell out of here.
But I'm holding you to your word.
I look forward to hearing the tales of your
Sorry... I was just trying to buy a pillow...
I... I know someone who can repair it!
\!I'm sure he will even do it for free!
\!I know he lives in the Castle's east town.
I'm going to play and sleep.
Check current objectives in the Quest tab.
Sorry for burning your computer, Wes...
Archmage, I haven't been entirely truthful with you.
\!The Quest I have for you is far from minor.
\!I never thought I'd live long enough to witness this...
An ancient evil has awoken, our world as we know it is
in deep trouble. \!The old scriptures preach that only a
man with defeaning hands can defeat this evil.
If we don't stop the propagation of such a corrupted
entity, every single person alive would perish from an
Archmage, you're the only one who stands a chance
With that staff of thunder, and your powerful allies,
you can bring light to this kingdom once more.
Archmange, the entire kingdom will revere you as
their hero. They will tell the tales of your heroics
The King hands Wes a fairy.
\!It's trapped in a bottle, faint writing reads /adv/.
What is this strange winged creature?
\|Are you willing to save this kingdom?
It would be an honour. I'll begin preparations immediately.
[Barter 20] This will be quite a difficult task. I'll require financial support.
It would be an honour. I'll begin preparations immediately.
Should it be to your liking Archmage,
I'll grant you a part of this fine Kingdom to rule,
That does sound rather appealing my lord.
\!I'll have to give it further consideration.
\!Now, let me give you something to help you on your way.
\!It is I who should be thanking you.
[Barter 20] This will be quite a difficult task. I'll require financial support.
This will be quite a difficult task.
\!It would be cowardly to place the weight of this
kingdom upon your shoulders, and leave you with nothing.
\!This ought to help you on your way.
Your generosity is appreciated, but this won't be
sufficient. The monster's attack wiped out much of my
home, I haven't got any supplies.
Wes levels his shotgun at the King.
\!Give me everything you've got and I might not blow
Every guard in my castle will come for you.
I respect your tenacity, but I won't tolerate threats.
I'll see to it after this is all over.
\!But I'm holding you to your word.
\!I'm looking forward to hearing the tales of your
If I never see you again, it'll be too soon.
I do understand the repercussions, I just don't care.
I'll cross that bridge when it comes to it.
I have nothing more to say to you.
Hmm... this \c[2]wooden plate\c[0] I found lets me glitch
through walls. Let's see if it works again.

through walls. Let's see if it works again.
